Sentencas: The contamination effect of hydrogen sulfide on micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells was investigated using various electrochemical techniques.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cells, mechanically supported by cupper tube, were provided by National Metal and Materials Technology Center, and they contain the electrode materials of nickel and yttria stabilized zirconia cermet for anode and lanthanum strontium manganate for cathode.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Pure hydrogen and hydrogen gas containing diluted hydrogen sulfide were repeatedly switched for the anode feed at the constant cell voltage of 0.9 V. Exposure times of 30 and 60 min were applied to study the effects of the poisoning interval.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Then, the obtained results were analyzed.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Herein, we reported two effects that had not been reported previously: the poisoning interval effect on the same hydrogen sulfide dosage and the poisoning sulfur-transport effect to the cathode surface.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the same dosage experiment, the recovery process was required before complete adsorption of sulfur species, and it supported not to fully block active sites of hydrogen adsorption and oxidation, and thus it would expand a cell lifespan on the contamination.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the analysis, different contamination steps between short and long term exposure time were presented, and thermodynamic parameters were calculated.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Also, transport of elemental sulfur from the anode to the cathode surface was presented using the energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy technique.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results appear to be strong evidence for the transport of sulfur from anode to cathode, and this means that the effect of sulfur diffusion to the cathode should be considered one major reason for performance degradation.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper provides additional possible reasons regarding the performance degradation on hydrogen sulfide contamination, and serves as a guide to overcome the barrier of the sulfur contamination.
Titulo: Sulfur diffusion of hydrogen sulfide contaminants to cathode in a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell
